Package com.lopl.melody.slash

Class SlashCommand

java.lang.Object
com.lopl.melody.slash.SlashCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
Clip, Disconnect, Help, Info, Join, Mixer, Pause, Ping, Play, Player, Queue, Record, Resume, Settings, Skip, Stop, Volume
public abstract class SlashCommand
extends java.lang.Object
Slash Command General functionality is defined here When entering a slash command in a guild chat, you are able to control the functionality of the command here.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected com.jagrosh.jdautilities.command.Command.Category category
    The category will define in which Category the command is sorted.
    protected java.lang.String description
    The description should give a short explanation of the command.
    protected java.lang.String help
    The help String will get displayed when the user triggers the help Command with this specific command.
    protected java.lang.String name
    A name is required for every SlashCommand to being able to be executed via discord.

  • Field Details

    • name

      protected java.lang.String name
      A name is required for every SlashCommand to being able to be executed via discord.

    • category

      protected com.jagrosh.jdautilities.command.Command.Category category
      The category will define in which Category the command is sorted.

    • help

      protected java.lang.String help
      The help String will get displayed when the user triggers the help Command with this specific command. For a simple implementation this String can be declared with triple quotes to keep line breaks easy.

    • description

      protected java.lang.String description
      The description should give a short explanation of the command. There is a max character limit

  • Constructor Details

    • SlashCommand

      public SlashCommand()

  • Method Details

    • onUpsert

      protected net.dv8tion.jda.api.requests.restaction.CommandCreateAction onUpsert​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.requests.restaction.CommandCreateAction cca)
      This will fire whenever a command reload is executed. this defines how the command is build.
      Parameters:
      cca - the object the command is build with. you can modify it as you want.
      Returns:
      the finished command builder

    • onBotStart

      protected void onBotStart()
      This will fire when the bot is started and the command is loaded. The JDA object at Melody.manager is not ready yet.

    • onJDAReady

      protected void onJDAReady​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.JDA jda)
      This will fire when the JDA object at Melody.manager is ready.

    • execute

      protected abstract void execute​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SlashCommandEvent event)
      This will fire whenever a user enters a slash command in a guild textchannel.
      Parameters:
      event - all the event data

    • clicked

      protected void clicked​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.ButtonClickEvent event, boolean anonymous)
      This will fire when a user clicked on a button regarding this command. The Button has to be registered beforehand with registerButton(Button).
      Parameters:
      event - all the button click event data
      anonymous - is true if the button was not cached and the class was found only with the ID

    • dropdown

      protected void dropdown​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SelectionMenuEvent event, boolean anonymous)
      This will fire when a user selected a option from a dropdown regarding this command. The Dropdown has to be registered beforehand with registerDropdown(SelectionMenu).
      Parameters:
      event - all the dropdown event data
      anonymous - is true if the dropdown was not cached and the class was found only with the ID

    • allowAnonymousComponentCall

      @Nullable public java.util.List<java.lang.String> allowAnonymousComponentCall()
      Some Buttons and SelectionMenus allow to execute the specific action, even if the message is really old. To keep track of all the ids of the Components, that support this, a list of ids is created. Override this method to add ids to this List.
      Returns:
      a List with always working Component ids.

    • getCommandEventListener

      @Nullable public net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter getCommandEventListener()
      If a Command needs to subscribe to any event provided by the discord api, You can create a subclass in your Command, that extends the ListenerAdapter. Override this method and return an instance of this class here to register the listener.
      Returns:
      any instance of an ListenerAdapter.

    • registerButton

      protected final void registerButton​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.Button button)
      You can register a created button with this. When this button is getting clicked by a user, the clicked(ButtonClickEvent, boolean) method will be called
      Parameters:
      button - the created button

    • registerDropdown

      protected final void registerDropdown​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.selections.SelectionMenu dropdown)
      You can register a created dropdown with this. When this dropdown is getting a new value selected by a user, the dropdown(SelectionMenuEvent, boolean) method will be called
      Parameters:
      dropdown - the created dropdown

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()

    • getCategory

      public com.jagrosh.jdautilities.command.Command.Category getCategory()

    • getHelp

      public java.lang.String getHelp()

      public java.lang.String getDescription()
